We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private AverageTrueRange _atr;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_atr = ATR(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_atr.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ATR True Range", _atr.TrueRange);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ATR Current", _atr.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.atr = self.ATR(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.atr.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ATR True Range", self.atr.TrueRange);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ATR Current", self.atr.Current);
